3b76c724-8159-43e1-b993-b500f2dd12e6.description: Certified Professionals in Training Management (CPTM™) undergo extensive training to learn the core responsibilities required to manage a high-performing training organization. CPTMs are certified in the principles needed to align learning and development with business goals and have demonstrated mastery of the most critical competencies defined in Training Industry's Training Manager Competency Model™.
3b76c724-8159-43e1-b993-b500f2dd12e6.name: Certified Professional in Training Management (CPTM)

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of 10 online learning modules
Successful completion of on-the-job assignments
Successful completion of a three or four day practicum
Successful completion of certification exam

05c55ef0-de1e-440b-b05b-9e36fdf9f305.description: Successfully managing your organization’s leadership development programs is key to ensuring your organization’s leaders are prepared for their current and future roles. The Leading Leadership Development Certificate equips you with the proprietary tools and methodologies developed by Training Industry through years of research into the leadership development strategies and programs utilized by high-performing training organizations.
05c55ef0-de1e-440b-b05b-9e36fdf9f305.name: Leading Leadership Development Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of 2 day course.

63efd6b9-5948-4958-9994-ca73fa8c16d4.description: The measuring the impact of L&D certificate teaches you multiple approaches and strategies to evaluate your training and development efforts and equips you with the tools you need identify the best approach and measurement method given the specific of your business goals.
63efd6b9-5948-4958-9994-ca73fa8c16d4.name: Measuring the Impact of L&D Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of 2 day course.

b8647b93-0c14-4c28-9685-ec3c191d18d1.description: The managing learning technologies certificate focuses specifically on training and development technologies, including administrative (e.g., LMS), authoring, delivery and reporting tools. Covering the entire learning technology life cycle, the program provides guidance on how to select, purchase, implement, maintain and retire training technologies.
b8647b93-0c14-4c28-9685-ec3c191d18d1.name: Managing Learning Technologies Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of 2 day course, including analysis of organization's learning technology architecture.

e049c36a-b756-4010-8bd0-f7405d7e5eb9.description: The Training Needs Assessment certificate course utilizes several areas of Training Industry’s Training Manager Competency Model™ to provide L&D leaders with an in-depth understanding of effective diagnostic and needs assessment approaches to ensure learning is targeted to organizational needs and priorities.
e049c36a-b756-4010-8bd0-f7405d7e5eb9.name: Training Needs Assessment

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of 2 day course.
